b3c968f4-b87a-4888-80ff-e90186376e75.name: Covenant of Rest
b3c968f4-b87a-4888-80ff-e90186376e75.notes: Cannot be summoned, reanimated or resurrected after death

594afe3f-7189-41df-ad4f-0c2ad11ac570.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Friendly Undergrowth
594afe3f-7189-41df-ad4f-0c2ad11ac570.notes: +1 in mundane Quick Contest when someone seeking your trail or hiding place in overgrown area

c791a270-70bc-4f9e-9bdc-3ec4ff58ef1f.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Reinforce
c791a270-70bc-4f9e-9bdc-3ec4ff58ef1f.notes: Can shield personal possessions from magical destruction

7fa8b196-66b6-4848-8b42-50c49dc6ec2f.name: Mighty Spell (Wrath of the Gods)
7fa8b196-66b6-4848-8b42-50c49dc6ec2f.notes: +2 damage or +1 damage per die when casting spell, costs 1 FP

262d5c5c-d6a3-49e6-9def-7045dd24aba4.name: Mundane Magic (Shape Earth as Smith)
262d5c5c-d6a3-49e6-9def-7045dd24aba4.notes: Can cast spell that appears to be use of mundane skill

0a196e0a-284c-47b7-aaeb-64d42372caa7.name: Mundane Magic (Shape Plant as Carpentry)
0a196e0a-284c-47b7-aaeb-64d42372caa7.notes: Can cast spell that appears to be use of mundane skill

c8121dfe-b9c8-439a-9b87-773d1c6202a9.name: Named Possession (Staff)
c8121dfe-b9c8-439a-9b87-773d1c6202a9.notes: Item has potential to gain magical properties when you perform deeds of thaumatological significance

16a90e40-ef56-4def-b5d4-d4585646a66b.name: Staff Attunement
16a90e40-ef56-4def-b5d4-d4585646a66b.notes: Any suitable item treated as if carrying Staff spell

02285d94-5a35-4cf5-8abe-535aa95aa995.name: Staff Bond (@Specific Staff@)
02285d94-5a35-4cf5-8abe-535aa95aa995.notes: When readied, may ignore -1 of current total penalty for spells 'on', if at least one was cast through bonded item

2e22ecf9-d0e0-43e2-93f2-00e12f0d5fa0.name: Power Casting (Wrath of the Gods)
2e22ecf9-d0e0-43e2-93f2-00e12f0d5fa0.notes: Add Power Casting level to Magery level for determining maximum energy expenditures

8d489e4c-3791-4a1a-8688-86737a196016.name: Shape Metal
8d489e4c-3791-4a1a-8688-86737a196016.casting_cost: 6 per cu yard (4 for soft metals)

837be773-6ff3-4031-9764-d9118a5e89c9.text: Template lists a perk "Staff" which doesn't exist.  Have instead added both "Staff Attunement" and "Staff Bond"
